    • Method Detail

      • recreateTree

        private void recreateTree(HuffmanNode node)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Generates the Huffman tree stored in this file (using Preorder traversal)
        Parameters:
        node - The tree's nodes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading the file

      • readFile

        private void readFile(java.lang.String outputFile)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Traverses the Huffman Tree stored in the file to decode each character
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The name of the decoded file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error with outputFile

      • decode

        public int decode(java.lang.String outputFile)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Puts everything together and generates the original (decoded) file
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The name of the decoded file
        Returns:
        0 if the file was successfully decoded, or -1 if the program's ID does not match
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error with the outputFile
